foka.messages.load.fabric:
Fabric Mod Loader detected!
Activating custom music in The End automatically!
foka.messages.load.forge:
Forge Mod Loader detected!
Activating custom music in The End automatically!
foka.messages.load.spigot:
Spigot/Paper detected!
Automatically changing certain gamerules in The End!
foka.messages.cmd.reset_config_to_defaul: All configs were reset to default!
foka.messages.cmd.hard_reset_dragon: Completely reset the Ender Dragon, witness the horror!
foka.messages.cmd.kill_ender_dragon: Succesfully slain the Ender Dragon, cheating for the win!
foka.messages.cmd.generate_end_island_fe: If they haven't generated automatically, this is a bug and has to be reported!
foka.messages.cmd.get_ancient_armor: Gave a full set of Ancient Armor
foka.messages.cmd.get_hallowed_armor: Gave a full set of Hallowed Armor
foka.messages.cmd.get_shulker_armor: Gave a full set of Shulker Armor
foka.messages.cmd.get_random_head: Gave a random 'Treasure Head', out of a total of 60
foka.items.armors.ancient_armor.set_bonu: Fills you with Wrath of The Ancients,
foka.items.armors.hallowed_armor.set_bon: Grants the ability to dodge attacks,
foka.items.armors.shulker_armor.set_bonu: Shulker Bullets will hunt down your attackers
foka.items.fish.mystical_heartfish.descr: Allows for up to 10 extra hearts
foka.items.potions.red_potion.flavor_tex: 'Just drink it, what could go wrong?'
foka.items.spellbooks.conveyance.descrip: teleports you to the first block it hits
Tilt your head around to guide it
foka.items.spellbooks.updraft.descriptio: Right Click to summon a cloud
You also fall slower while holding this book
foka.items.trinkest.crest_of_the_end.des: force to your next melee attack
foka.items.trinkest.ender_insignia.descr: Bonus starts weak and slowly increases
Standing up or being hurt resets it
The Dragon's Power is withing your hands
Stars fall when hurt, which ignore
foka.items.weapons.dragonblade.descripti: A fearsome sword with an otherwordly punch!
foka.items.weapons.dragonblade.flavor_te: 'It came from the edge of The End'
foka.items.weapons.prismatic_punch.descr: that produce colorful explosions on hit
foka.items.weapons.spirit_dagger.descrip: Holding one attracts Spirits on slashes
Holding one in both left and right hand
allows you to consume said Spirits
and gain a short attack buff
foka.items.weapons.tamaris.description.2: instantly killing nearby enemies with low health!
foka.items.weapons.frigid_harvester.desc: Imbues itself with souls of slain mobs,
foka.items.fisher_of_voids.description.1: Its hook is covered in weird mucus,
foka.items.pandoras_barrel.description.1: Summons mobs and drops loot depending on the biome
foka.items.pandoras_barrel.description.2: Much friendlier mobs spawn while in a lit up area
foka.items.pandoras_barrel.flavor_text: 'Get it? Because it is a barrel and not a box?'
foka.items.cursed_tome.description: Contains all Altar of The Accursed recipes
foka.advancements.x.description: Enrage an Enderman by looking at it
foka.advancements.beam_me_up.description: Teleport over 100 meters from a single throw of an Ender Pearl
foka.advancements.bullseye_2.description: Hit a bullseye of a Target Block with an Ender Pearl from at least 10 blocks
foka.advancements.champions_ballad.descr: Cant fight a Boss without some good tunes!
foka.advancements.night_sky_stalkers.des: Kill a Phantom. They will vanish as soon as you get some sleep
foka.advancements.postmortal_2.descripti: Save yourself from death in The Void with a Totem of Undying
foka.advancements.pandoras_barrel_open_i: Open a Pandora's Barrel inside Deep Dark. Odds are that you will survive...
Place down and open a Pandora's Barrel. You never know what you're gonna get!
foka.advancements.aota_intro.description: Toss any Enchanted Book over the Altar of The Accursed to imbue it with the darkest of magic
foka.advancements.i_am_titanium.descript: Craft a full set of Shulker Armor
foka.advancements.cursed_crafting.descri: Use the Altar of The Accursed to craft some of the most powerful of gear
foka.advancements.kaliyah.description: Deal maximum damage possible with a single Dragonblade's punch
foka.advancements.dragonborn.description: Obtain the Dragonblade, a legendary sword of a truly unknown origin...
foka.advancements.disassembly.descriptio: Use Tamaris to execute a mob with low health
foka.advancements.god_slayer.description: You have proven yourself worthy by defeating the vicious Beast twice
foka.advancements.kill_la_kill.descripti: Trigger the Execute ability on a Warden.
foka.advancements.sacrificial_ritual.des: Place down 4 End Crystals on top of the 4 elevated Obsidian Blocks to awake the vicious beast...
Summon the Ender Dragon a third time
foka.advancements.hallelujah.description: Dodge an attack with a full set of Hallowed Armor
foka.advancements.colorful_arsenal.descr: Color a Shulker Box any color you want
foka.advancements.kill_shulker.descripti: Kill a Shulker for its Shells
foka.advancements.jeb_.description: Craft all color variants of Shulker Boxes
foka.advancements.rename_shulker_box.des: Rename a Shulker Box with an Anvil
foka.advancements.super_sonic.descriptio: Use Elytra to fly through a 1 by 1 gap while moving faster than 40 m/s
foka.advancements.treasure_room.descript: Obtain a rare Treasure Head from a chest in an End City. Can you find all 60?
foka.advancements.open_chest_in_end_city: Open a Treasure Chest in an End City. Congrats! You are propably a millionaire now
foka.advancements.forever_stranded.descr: Find a Village in the middle of nowhere. How did they get here? Let's find out...
foka.advancements.keep_warm.description: Wear a full set of Leather Armor in any of the coldest biomes of The End
foka.advancements.spirit_assasin.descrip: Teleport over 60 blocks with a pair of Spirit Daggers
foka.advancements.topped_off.description: Attain maximum health by consuming 10 Mystical Heartfish
foka.advancements.duskberry_find.descrip: Pick up a Duskberry from a chest in Hallow's End Ship
foka.advancements.poor_life_choices.desc: Eat, plant and feed a Fox a Duskberry
foka.advancements.absolute_devotion.desc: Upgrade your Netherite Hoe to its Shulker version. You have officialy became the master of Husbandry!
foka.advancements.confusing_fruit_2.desc: Find and eat a Golden Chorus Fruit
foka.advancements.find_gloop.description: Free a Gloop from a Pandora's Barrel opened in any Swamp biome.
foka.advancements.plant_chorus_fruit_2.d: Plant a Chorus Flower in every of the 3 dimensions
foka.advancements.plant_chors_fruitx.des: Plant a Chorus Flower in the Overworld
foka.advancements.supreme_server_owner.d: Fish out an 'ultra super rare (not really)' collectible from The Void
foka.advancements.the_void_provides.desc: Fish out and open a Crate from the unknown
foka.advancements.void_reels.description: Cast your Fishing Rod into the open darkness of The End
foka.advancements.find_warped_forest.des: Enter the Warped Forest - the home of Endermen of The Nether
foka.advancements.a_step_to_the_end.desc: Blaze Powder is usually used for brewing, but perhaps something could be fused with it...?
foka.advancements.imbuements.description: ...and use it to brew Lingering Potions!
foka.advancements.the_beggining.descript: Kill the Wither in The End
foka.advancements.rare_find.description: Obtain an uncommon drop from the Illagers residing in Strongholds
foka.advancements.journeys_end.descripti: Use 12 Eyes of Ender to activate an End Portal
foka.advancements.obtain_ender_pearl.des: Get your hands on an Ender Pearl - a vital element of your journey
foka.advancements.craft_ender_eye.descri: Once you combine Blaze Powder and an Ender Pearl they turn into... something special?
foka.advancements.kill_dragon.descriptio: The Beast is dead, and The End is waiting for you to discover its secrets...
foka.advancements.max_out_aery_sword.des: Reach +15 Extra Damage on Frigid Harvester
foka.advancements.max_out_aery_sword.tip: ᴛɪᴘ: ᴛʜɪѕ ᴍɪɢʜᴛ ʀᴇǫᴜɪʀᴇ ѕᴏᴍᴇ ɢʀɪɴᴅɪɴɢ...
foka.death_messages.example_cause: %s died randomly due to an example of FSEE's custom damage system
foka.death_messages.sharanga_explosion: %1$s was torn apart by %2$s's Spectral Boom
foka.death_messages.carcanet: %1$s was struck too hard by %2$s's star
foka.death_messages.dragonblade: %1$s was punched into the otherworld by %2$s
advancements.end.dragon_egg.title: Dragon Knight
item.minecraft.music_disc_pigstep.desc: HoloMyth - Take Me Home, Contry Roads
incendium.advancement.root.title: Nether, but much more dangerous
incendium.advancement.root.desc: Explore the terrifying, and rewarding, The Nether
incendium.advancement.infernal_dunes.roo: Experience the blazing heat of the Infernal Dunes
incendium.advancement.infernal_dunes.dun: Kill one of the odd Desert Blazes native to the Infernal Dunes
incendium.advancement.infernal_dunes.bor: Kill a Desert Blaze on the boundary of light and dark to get both of its drops
incendium.advancement.infernal_dunes.inf: Sacrifice a nether star at an altar to summon the Hovering Inferno
You can't kill the Inferno. Just survive to win
Survive the Inferno's last spell and claim your reward
Survive the Inferno's final phase with no armor
Use the Infernal Feather to upgrade your elytra in a Smithing Table
incendium.advancement.ash_barrens.root.d: Enter the Ash Barrens, the forgotten home to the Forbidden Castle
incendium.advancement.ash_barrens.enter_: In the Hall of the Piglin King
In the Golden Age, a great King ruled this castle. But he was betrayed, cursed, and exiled from his Kingdom. This is what remains.
incendium.advancement.ash_barrens.conque: Storm a Forbidden Castle and kill every last piglin living inside
incendium.advancement.ash_barrens.duel_o: Give a Sentry a taste of its own medicine
incendium.advancement.volcanic_deltas.hi: Mine the exposed ancient debris in the height of the Volcanic Deltas
Beware the beautiful and deadly Quartz Flats
incendium.advancement.quartz_flats.floor: Brave the Quartz Flats' frozen lava seas
incendium.advancement.quartz_flats.ghast: Kill a ghast on its home turf above the frozen lava seas
incendium.advancement.quartz_flats.rescu: Enter the Quartz Tower, the prison of the Ghastlings
incendium.advancement.quartz_flats.faile: Enter the Quartz Tower, where the ancient Ghastlings perished in prison
incendium.advancement.quartz_flats.speci: Afflict a ghast with Speed, Regeneration and Invisibility -- then kill it to obtain its Ghastling
incendium.advancement.quartz_flats.feed_: Feed a Ghastling its odd favorite food - fire charges - to toggle it following you
incendium.advancement.quartz_flats.torte: Kill the skeleton chef Torte and loot his kitchen
Find the hidden treasure in the Quartz Kitchen
incendium.advancement.quartz_flats.sanct: The Illagers' Sanctum might not be so holy...
Infiltrate the Sanctum vault and silence its guards to remove Mining Fatigue
incendium.advancement.withered_forest.ro: Enter the Withered Forest, ancestral battleground of the Piglins and Wither Skeletons
incendium.advancement.withered_forest.ch: Put on some chain armor and use it to dispel a restless spirit
incendium.advancement.misc.ruined_lab.de: The piglin's experiments backfired leading to a dangerous situation
incendium.advancement.toxic_heap.root.de: Enter the nuclear wastelands of the Toxic Heap
incendium.advancement.toxic_heap.slime_p: Get poisoned by a toxic slime
incendium.advancement.toxic_heap.mystic_: Discover every type of loot in a Nether Reactor
incendium.advancement.misc.root.title: Strange Biomes
incendium.advancement.misc.loot_piglin_v: Steal some loot from a Piglin Village
incendium.advancement.infernal_dunes.pip: Enter a pipeline, but beware the dangerous sentry blazes
Get hit by a Sentry's lightning attack

incendium.item.voltaic_trident.system.un: struggles to be stable with the channeling enchantment

incendium.item.unstable_powder.desc1: Emits a brilliant light when dropped (press Q)
incendium.item.scarlet_dagger.name: Scarlet Dagger
incendium.item.scarlet_dagger.desc1: Drains the life of its slain victims

incendium.item.daybreaker.desc1: Has a chance to drop gold

incendium.item.battle_helm.name: Scout's Battle Helm
incendium.item.battle_helm.desc1: You can hide, but you can't
incendium.item.warping_witherblade.name: Warping Witherblade
incendium.item.warping_witherblade.desc1: For in life all things return
incendium.item.warping_witherblade.desc2: to death, and in death all things
incendium.item.trailblazer.name: Trailblazer
incendium.item.trailblazer.desc2: the longer you pull the bow.
incendium.item.trailblazer.system.fail: requires a fully drawn back bow to function
incendium.item.trailblazer.system.wet: has become wet. You must dry it off before using it again
incendium.item.trailblazer.system.still_: is still wet and cannot function
incendium.item.ragnarok.name: Ragnarok
incendium.item.ragnarok.desc1: The longer you hold back the bow,
incendium.item.ragnarok.desc2: the more powerful the lightning you create
incendium.item.ragnarok.system.unstable: is becoming unstable the longer you hold it's power within
incendium.item.ragnarok.system.storm: is becoming more unstable during the storm
incendium.item.hazmat.helmet.name: Hazmat Helmet
incendium.item.hazmat.chestplate.name: Hazmat Chestplate
incendium.item.hazmat.leggings.name: Hazmat Leggings
incendium.item.hazmat.boots.name: Hazmat Boots
incendium.item.returning_scroll.name: Scroll of Returning
incendium.item.returning_scroll.system.w: The ancient technique withstood itself, this time...
incendium.item.returning_scroll.system.c: The ancient technique crumbled upon usage
incendium.item.returning_scroll.system.f: The Scroll of Returning only understands the Nether dimension!
incendium.item.restless_nature.name: Restless Nature
incendium.item.restless_nature.desc2: with a final wish to regrow
incendium.item.restless_nature.desc3: the lost nature of the Nether
incendium.item.cake.name: Cake Batter
incendium.item.cake.system.ache: You've eaten too much cake and received a stomach ache
incendium.item.suspicious_brew.name: Suspicious Brew
incendium.item.miners_ale.name: Miner's Ale
incendium.item.undying_elixer.name: Elixir of Undying
incendium.item.death_pot.name: Death Potion
incendium.item.death_pot.desc2: Drink the brew, and bide the danger,
incendium.item.death_pot.desc3: Or wonder till it drives you mad;
incendium.item.death_pot.desc4: What would have happened if you had?

incendium.item.misc.feed.name: Ghastling Feed
